name: Robot Incursion
description: Robot Incursion is a room scale casual VR wave shooter for the HTC Vive. You will have to defend yourself for as long as possible, against endless waves of enemy robots in various environments.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better, Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive required
